thread.title: Delta Air Lines joins bid to save bankrupt Skymark
thread.title_full: Delta Air Lines joins bid to save bankrupt Skymark | MENAFN.COM

title: Delta Air Lines joins bid to save bankrupt Skymark
text:
(MENAFN) US carrier Delta Air Lines will join a bid to rescue Japan's bankrupt carrier Skymark, possibly giving it unprecedented access to the domestic market, Oman Observer reported.

The announcement followed a report that said the plan, under which Delta would buy as much as 20 percent of Skymark, would give the US airline access to domestic landing slots at Tokyo's Haneda airport.

The Intrepid-led plan is a rival offer to one submitted by Skymark earlier this year that would see it owned by its banks, All Nippon Airways (ANA) and a domestic investment fund.
